record.id: field.name="number" and file.name="problem" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: number
record.file.name: problem

brief.brief: To perform a search based on this field, type the Incident record number, in the form IMxxxx, where xxxx is the number.

For best results, specify the full Incident record number. If you have a partial number, type the partial number to access a list of possible records, but your list may not include all possible records.
Before searching, clear the Smart Search check-box.
Do not use wildcards, such as *, in your search.

detail.detail: The sequential number routine generates this number based on the Incident Management class in the number table.
This is a number (type 1) field in the header structure.
Service Manager uses this field in the unique key "header, number and header,page".
